characters.story: "LAH!" the flesh, mouse, and hairs command sharply - dried meat, cured and preserved!
"LAH!" the insect commands sharply - wax, beeswax, and candle!
"LYEH!" the dog commands sharply - to hunt, chase game!
"SOH!" the boat sings cheerfully - vessels, ships to measure!
The woman bends down drooping - elder brother's wife, sister-in-law!
"SHOH!" it commands sharply - emaciated, thin, and skinny!
"SOH!" the detective's fingers sing cheerfully while searching through the drawers for clues!
"DAO!" the farmer commands sharply, scooping up wild unhulled rice from the paddy!
The wooden leg bends down drooping as he treads carefully across the muddy path.
"TAO!" the surging water sings cheerfully, rushing like a scoop pouring endlessly!
"SHYEN!" she commands sharply when her car got stuck in the pinnacle's mud trap!
"YEN!" the flame commands sharply, leaping high from the campfire!
"SHYEN!" the chef commands sharply, spooning dumpling filling into the pothole-shaped dough!
"LYAHNG!" he commands sharply, counting the vehicles lined up on the road!
"MAN?" her twenty eyeballs question curiously - is she trying to dissemble and hide the truth from the yoke?
The St. Bernard dog bends down drooping after stitching - he's frank about his exhaustion.
"JWAY!" the seamstress commands sharply, using threads to embellish the stitching on the dress!
"PUNG!" the stone commands sharply when they bump into the wall!
